title: Manage Stockpile Blending
description: A stockpile manager directs haul trucks to dump ore from different parts of the pit onto specific locations on the ROM pad to build a blended stockpile.

tasks.description: Retrieve the stockpile blending plan, which specifies the target grade and the required tons from different ore sources.
tasks.expected_outcome: The blending recipe for the stockpile is understood.

tasks.description: As a haul truck carrying high-grade ore approaches, instruct the dispatcher to assign it to dump on the 'high-grade' section of the stockpile.
tasks.expected_outcome: The truck is correctly dispatched to the right dump location.

tasks.description: Update the digital model of the stockpile with the new load, tracking the build-up of tons and grade in real-time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The stockpile inventory model is updated, showing the current blended grade is on target.
